subject: Football
lead_paragraph: In a locker room full of veterans who favor designer man bags and muted conversation, second-year cornerback Justin Miller stands out like a squeaky chew toy that the Jets’ adopted stray cat dragged in.
snippet: In a locker room full of veterans who favor designer man bags and muted conversation, second-year cornerback Justin Miller stands out like a squeaky chew toy that the Jets’ adopted stray cat dragged in.
